titles.title: 3-nen D-Gumi Glass no Kamen
3ねんDぐみガラスの仮面
The Glass Mask Year 3 Class D
3年D班玻璃假面

relatedanime.anime: 3-nen D-Gumi Glass no Kamen: Tobidase Watashitachi no Victory Road

anime.description: To "warm up" cold hearts of modern people, Maya, Ayumi, Chigusa, and Yuu have teleported from the universe of Glass Mask to a modern high school, trying to ignite the passion of drama among high schooler nowadays. School director Masumi, however, thinks otherwise. Source: ANN

tag.name: themes
tag.description: Themes describe the very central elements important to the anime stories. They set the backdrop against which the protagonists must face their challenges. Be it School Life, present Daily Life, Military action, Cyberpunk, Law and Order detective work, Sports, or the Underworld. These are only but a few of the more typical backgrounds for anime plots. Add to that a Conspiracy setting with a possible tragic outcome, the Themes span most of the imaginable subject matter relevant to anime.

tag.name: setting
tag.description: The setting describes in what time and place an anime takes place. To a certain extent it describes what you can expect from the world in the anime.

tag.name: elements
tag.description: Next to Themes setting the backdrop for the protagonists in anime, there are the more detailed plot Elements that centre on character interactions: "What do characters do to each other or what is done to them?". Is it violent Action, an awe-inspiring Adventure in a foreign place, the gripping life of a Detective, a slapstick Comedy, an Ecchi Harem anime, a SciFi epic, or some Fantasy travelling adventure?

tag.name: time
tag.description: This placeholder lists different epochs in human history and more vague but important timelines such as the future, the present and the past.

tag.name: parody
tag.description: Anime that imitate other stories (can be from TV, film, books, historical events, ...) for comic effect by exaggerating the style and changing the content of the original. Also known as spoofs. It can also refer to when whole elements of one work are lifted out of their context and reused.

tag.name: comedy
tag.description: Anime whose central struggle causes hilarious results. These stories are built upon funny characters, situations and events. A comedy anime is laced with humour and sets out to provoke laughter from the audience. Japanese humour can be a bit strange to westerners, so if you`re new to this type of humour, just bear with it; it`ll most likely grow on you if you`re a fan of other kinds of comedy.

tag.name: school life
tag.description: Since a large part of the anime audience still takes part in school life or is visiting college, it is only natural to choose a setting the audience can identify with, be it elementary, middle, or high school. For the older viewers a college setting with more mature real-life problems is appropriate. And since clubs take up so much time in the lives of students, these are obviously also important.

tag.name: CGI
tag.description: Computer-generated imagery (CGI) or computer animation is the art of creating moving images via the use of computers. It is a subfield of computer graphics and animation. Increasingly it is created by means of 3D computer graphics, though 2D computer graphics are still widely used for stylistic, low bandwidth, and faster real-time rendering needs. Sometimes the target of the animation is the computer itself, but sometimes the target is another medium, such as film.

tag.name: short episodes
tag.description: Short episodes are regular episodes that are much shorter than the standard length. This means up to and including 10 minutes; shows with episodes that are 11 to 20 minutes in length are http://anidb.net/t6494 [half-length episodes] instead. Not to be confused with http://anidb.net/t6349 [multi-segment episodes], which are regular episodes that are split into several short segments (parts), usually with separate titles and independent storylines.

tag.name: 3D CG animation
tag.description: Abbreviation for "three-dimensional computer generated animation" or "computer graphics" (CGI). The traditional 2D art is enhanced by 3D imagery developed through computer modeling software. Done in the right way, this union of 3D in a 2D animated world can be a very beautiful relationship. The difference lies in what lacks the traditional 2D animation all together and may give term to something produced entirely with 3D graphics (such as the 2006 remake of "Appleseed" , 2007`s "Vexille", the 2008 addition to the "Biohazard" series and the more well known "Final Fantasy: The Spirits Within" and "Advent Children").

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

episode.title: 仲直りを熱くするのです
Let`s Make Up Passionately
Nakanaori o Atsuku Suru no Desu
episode.summary: A girl from Ayumi and Maya`s class had a terrible fight with her best friend. Now she needs help with making up, but will she actually get help from Ayumi and Maya? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 引きこもりを熱くするのです
Make the Shut-in Passionate
Hikikomori o Atsuku Suru no Desu
episode.summary: Sakurakouji-kun has become a hikikomori. Does Maya have what it takes to bring him back out? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 席替えを熱くするのです
Make the Seating Change Passionate
Sekigae o Atsuku Suru no Desu
episode.summary: Today is the day where the seating order changes. Both Ayumi and Maya have to make a choice to face the ultimate terror. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: さぁ 送信タイミングを熱くするのです
Now, Let Us Make the Send Timing Passionate
Sa Soushin Timing o Atsuku Suru no Desu
episode.summary: Today`s task for Ayumi and Maya is to figure out the perfect timing for hitting "Send" on the love email, but things don`t go quite as planned. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Ending
テスト勉強を熱くするのです
Make Studying for an Exam Passionate
Test Benkyou o Atsuku Suru no Desu
episode.summary: Studying for the dreaded exam week is something every student struggles with. If Maya can get her soul into studying, every student can benefit. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アルバイトを熱くするのです
Make the Part-Time Job Passionate
Arbeit o Atsuku Suru no Desu
episode.summary: A classmate is bored with his part time job. Chigusa tasks the two girls to experience what it`s like, in order to find a way to make part time jobs fun. However, Hayami Masumi is interfering. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 草食男子を熱くするのです
Let`s Make the Herbivore Boy Passionate
Soushoku Danshi o Atsuku Suru no Desu
episode.summary: Today`s missions is to make an herbivore boy start being interested in girls. Maya tries to get to the bottom of what it means to be a herbivore. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 既読スルーを熱くするのです
Let`s Make the Messages That Were Only Read Passionate
Kidoku Through o Atsuku Suru no Desu
episode.summary: Maya and Ayumi are lead to the graveyard of all the messages that were read but not replied to. In order to end their suffering, Ayumi becomes their chat partner. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 自分探しを熱くするのです
Make Self-Discovery Passionate
Jibun Sagashi o Atsuku Suru no Desu
episode.summary: In order to discover your true self, you must first kill yourself. Those were the words Tsukikage-sensei spoke to her students. While Ayumi chose to become "someone else", Maya chose something else... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 学園祭を熱くするのです
Let`s Make the School Festival Passionate
Gakuensai o Atsuku Suru no Desu
episode.summary: The school festival is coming up and class 3-D has to decide what to do. Maya, Ayumi, and Sakurakouji put on a show to convince their class that a play is the right choice. But is that enough to reach the passionless classmates of the present time? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 合コンを熱くするのです
Let`s Make the Mixer Passionate
Goukon o Atsuku Suru no Desu
episode.summary: In order to learn about the modern custom of mixer parties, Maya and the others meet at a restaurant. Somehow, the focus of the party shifts to squid... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 非モテ非リア充を熱くするのです
Let`s Make the Unpopular and Online-centric Person Passionate
Himote Hireal-juu o Atsuku Suru no Desu
episode.summary: Today`s mission is about making a classmate more popular, but then a phone call derails the group`s efforts. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最終回を熱くするのです
Make the Final Episode Passionate
Saishuukai o Atsuku Suru no Desu
episode.summary: The final episode reveals a surprising fact and shows that even Tsukikage-sensei had a misconception about acting... Source: crunchyroll
